post.summary: Post a new entity to datasets
Posts new data rows into the specified table

delete.summary: Deletes all rows from the specified table

get.summary: Gets all tables within the specified dataset

put.summary: Updates a schema and metadata for the specified table

get.summary: Gets the dataset metadata for the specifeid dataset id

delete.summary: Deletes the dataset with the specified id

get.summary: Gets a list of bound gateway datasources for the specified dataset
Gets a list of datasource for the specified dataset

post.summary: Sets all connections for the specified dataset

patch.summary: Updates the credentials for the specified datasource

get.summary: Get all datasources of specific gateway
Returns a list of gateways for the workspace collection
Returns a list of gateways for the specified workspace
Returns a list of imports for the specified workspace

post.summary: Creates a new import using the specified import info

parameters.name: datasetDisplayName
parameters.description: The display name of the dataset

parameters.name: nameConflict
parameters.description: Determines what to do if a dataset with the same name already exists

get.summary: Gets the import metadata for the specifed import id
Returns a list of workspaces for the specified collection

post.summary: Creates a new workspace within a workspace collection

get.summary: Gets a list of reports available within the specified workspace

reports.description: The reports associated with this import

datasets.description: The datasets associated with this import

defaultRetentionPolicy.description: The dataset default data retention policy

datasources.description: The datasources associated with this dataset

columns.description: The column schema for this table

rows.description: The data rows within this tabe
